DOC.brief_title: Effect Liraglutide Blood Glucose Control Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes Treated oral antidiabetic ( OAD ) drug least 3 month Treated one OAD moderate poor glycemic control Body Mass Index ( BMI ) less equal 45.0 kg/m2 Treatment insulin within last three month prior trial except due intercurrent illness , discretion Investigator Any serious medical condition Treatment drug could interfere glucose level
